project.title: Padel
project.intro: Paris Premier Padel Major website built with React. PPPM official website giving access to the latest news, pictures and videos as well as live scoring and ticketing system.
chall: Front-end development from Figma design using React and CSS-in-JS
Use Styled-system and Emotion for styling
Used advanced CSS grid developed for the layout of the blog, image and video items
Ensured responsiveness of the different components of the site

relatedLinks.title: Tripser Blog
relatedLinks.intro: Tripser blog built with Next.js, Sass, i18n and MDX.
chall: Ensure great SEO practice in the code
Handle translation in the blog with i18n
Develop a rich text editor to create markdown content
Set up and develop MDX components

relatedLinks.title: Omega
relatedLinks.intro: Omega zoo booking website with React. Information about the park and its animals as well as ability to book your stay, table or entrance via ticketing system.
chall: Integration and front-end development from Figma designs to React and CSS-in-JS coding
Use Styled-system and Emotion for styling
Complex components in the likes of a Swiper, a Carousel, Deep navigation bar and Filtering
Used recent CSS features in the names of Image clip-path and CSS grids
